Paragraph: A thin TiO 2 nanoparticle layer was then spin - coated onto the blend film , followed by aluminum evaporation.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| TiO 2 nanoparticles |
| Blend film |
| Aluminum |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Blend film |

(Note: "thin layer" and "followed by" do not refer to specific materials and are not included in the table.)
